section.name: Getting Started: Installation
section.p: You can put together a heterogeneous cluster of Tomcat, Jetty,Geronimo and JBoss instances.

If you are using a clustered configuration
Download a copy of activemq-3.2.1 - unpack it somewhere
Set ACTIVEMQ_HOME to this dir and export it
Then
Either:
download a copy of WADI 2.0-SNAPSHOT - unpack it somewhere
set WADI_HOME to this dir and export it
Or:
check out the latest WADI src from CVS
Build it
set WADI_HOME to the top of this tree and export it
